verses.verse: Gater yourselves together <WH7197> <WH8703>, yea, gather together <WH7197> <WH8798>, O nation <WH1471> not desired <WH3700> <WH8737>;

Before the decree <WH2706> bring forth <WH3205> <WH8800>, before the day <WH3117> pass <WH5674> <WH8804> as the chaff <WH4671>, before <WH3808> the fierce <WH2740> anger <WH639> of the YY <WH3068> come <WH935> <WH8799> upon you, before the day <WH3117> of the YY'S <WH3068> anger <WH639> come <WH935> <WH8799> upon you.

Seek <WH1245> <WH8761> ye the YY <WH3068>, all ye meek <WH6035> of the earth <WH776>, which have wrought <WH6466> <WH8804> his judgment <WH4941>; seek <WH1245> <WH8761> righteousness <WH6664>, seek <WH1245> <WH8761> meekness <WH6038>: it may be <WH194> ye shall be hid <WH5641> <WH8735> in the day <WH3117> of the YY'S <WH3068> anger <WH639>.

For Gaza <WH5804> shall be forsaken <WH5800> <WH8803>, and Ashkelon <WH831> a desolation <WH8077>: they shall drive out <WH1644> <WH8762> Ashdod <WH795> at the noon day <WH6672>, and Ekron <WH6138> shall be rooted up <WH6131> <WH8735>.

Woe <WH1945> unto the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the sea <WH3220> coast <WH2256>, the nation <WH1471> of the Cherethites <WH3774> ! the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> is against you; O Kanahan <WH3667>, the land <WH776> of the Philistines <WH6430>, I will even destroy <WH6> <WH8689> thee, that there shall be no inhabitant <WH3427> <WH8802>.
And the sea <WH3220> coast <WH2256> shall be dwellings <WH5116> and cottages <WH3741> for shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802>, and folds <WH1448> for flocks <WH6629>.

And the coast <WH2256> shall be for the remnant <WH7611> of the house <WH1004> of Y'hudah <WH3063>; they shall feed <WH7462> <WH8799> thereupon: in the houses <WH1004> of Ashkelon <WH831> shall they lie down <WH7257> <WH8799> in the evening <WH6153>: for the YY <WH3068> their 'Elohim <WH430> shall visit <WH6485> <WH8799> them, and turn away <WH7725> <WH8804> their captivity <WH7622> <WH8675> <WH7622>.

I have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> the reproach <WH2781> of Moab <WH4124>, and the revilings <WH1421> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>, whereby they have reproached <WH2778> <WH8765> my people <WH5971>, and magnified <WH1431> <WH8686> themselves against their border <WH1366>.

Therefore as I live <WH2416>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Surely Moab <WH4124> shall be as Sodom <WH5467>, and the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> as Gomorrah <WH6017>, even the breeding <WH4476> of nettles <WH2738>, and saltpits <WH4379> <WH4417>, and a perpetual <WH5704> <WH5769> desolation <WH8077>: the residue <WH7611> of my people <WH5971> shall spoil <WH962> <WH8799> them, and the remnant <WH3499> of my people <WH1471> shall possess <WH5157> <WH8799> them.

This shall they have for their pride <WH1347>, because they have reproached <WH2778> <WH8765> and magnified <WH1431> <WH8686> themselves against the people <WH5971> of the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>.

The YY <WH3068> will be terrible <WH3372> <WH8737> unto them: for he will famish <WH7329> <WH8804> all the 'elohim <WH430> of the earth <WH776>; and men shall worship <WH7812> <WH8691> him, every one <WH376> from his place <WH4725>, even all the isles <WH339> of the heathen <WH1471>.
Ye Ethiopians <WH3569> also, ye <WH1992> shall be slain <WH2491> by my sword <WH2719>.

And he will stretch out <WH5186> <WH8799> his hand <WH3027> against the north <WH6828>, and destroy <WH6> <WH8762> Ashur <WH804>; and will make <WH7760> <WH8799> Ninveh <WH5210> a desolation <WH8077>, and dry <WH6723> like a wilderness <WH4057>.

And flocks <WH5739> shall lie down <WH7257> <WH8804> in the midst <WH8432> of her, all the beasts <WH2416> of the nations <WH1471>: both the cormorant <WH6893> and the bittern <WH7090> shall lodge <WH3885> <WH8799> in the upper lintels <WH3730> of it; their voice <WH6963> shall sing <WH7891> <WH8787> in the windows <WH2474>; desolation <WH2721> shall be in the thresholds <WH5592>: for he shall uncover <WH6168> <WH8765> the cedar work <WH731>.

This is the rejoicing <WH5947> city <WH5892> that dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> carelessly <WH983>, that said <WH559> <WH8802> in her heart <WH3824>, I am, and there is none beside <WH657> me: how is she become a desolation <WH8047>, a place for beasts <WH2416> to lie down in <WH4769> ! every one that passeht by <WH5674> <WH8802> her shall hiss <WH8319> <WH8799>, and wag <WH5128> <WH8686> his hand <WH3027>.
